title: Mars.War.Logs-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Mars.War.Logs-R.G.Mechanics

Year: 2013
Publication Type: RePack | RG Mechanics
Tablet: {enclosing} SKIDROW
Version: 1.0 (build 1722)
Language:  RUS,  ENG
Sound language:  ENG

Description: 

Once people began to colonize Mars and have achieved great success in this. 
They have created a whole areas suitable for human and animal life by learning 
to control the spread of plant organisms that are saturated with the atmosphere 
of life-giving oxygen. On the Red Planet of the city grew, there were agricultural 
centers, scientific research centers. A century after the disaster, Mars plunged 
into chaos, the power of the planet was divided between conservative and Abundance 
by young guild Technomancers, spoon the magical power of the artifacts. Both camps 
control the supply of the most valuable resource on the planet - water. The main 
character - a talented and cynical scoundrel named Roy caught by one of the 
parties, and landed in jail. The authors promise a generous set of quests, 
dynamic and tactical combat, an elaborate system of "craft" and 
interesting characters.

Game Features

Develop character, form and improve his fighting style by choosing from 
dozens of abilities and improvements. 

Create and modify equipment and weapons to always be 
one step ahead of any enemy. 

In real time you have to fight against the most dangerous 
and terrible denizens of Mars. Your life will depend on the 
ability to think quickly and to choose the best tactics. 

Choosing replica in dialogues and decisions entail consequences 
which will determine not only the fate of the protagonist, 
but also all those who will cross your path. Perhaps it is 
you who decide the fate of the colonists on Mars.

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7  (SP1) 
Processor: Intel  Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or AMD  Athlon 64 4400 + 
Memory: 2 GB 
Video: Nvidia  GeForce  8800 GT or ATI Radeon HD 3850 512 MB 
Sound card: compatible with DirectX  9.0 
Free space on hard disk: 2.55 GB
Starting: Install and play.

Repack Features  

Do not cut / recoded 
Game Version - 1.0 (build 1722) 
Optional crack from Werewolf (v1.4) 
Release from RG Mechanics
